Helen operates a business selling clothing, household utensils and slippers.  She is requesting a loan of 7000 PHP to be used as an additional capital to buy  T-shirts, pants and slippers to resell. She hopes that through this business she can be successful in raising her children and in supporting their education.

loans.use: to buy T-shirts, pants and slippers for resale

loans.name: Juana

texts.en: Juana is 39 years old and a rice farmer from the community of Ubay, Bohol. She is married with four children ages 17-22. Juana’s business has been in existence for 23 years now. She is asking for a loan of 8000 PHP to buy fertilizer, insecticides and pay for labor during land preparation. She hopes that she can expand her business and have a comfortable life out of her business.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer, insecticides and for labor expenses

loans.name: Carlota

texts.es:
Carlota, solicita un nuevo préstamo por la necesidad de obtener financiamiento para invertir en el negocio de loza. Este le permitirá comprar tierra (barro para loza), leña, nacazcol, loza, pagar  transporte de mercadería  y mano de obra, entre otros gastos.
El crédito anterior le permitió comprar materia prima para la época del invierno con ese material se elaboró producto durante casi todo el año, por lo que el crédito es de gran ayuda para nosotros.
El núcleo familiar se mantiene y las condiciones económicas son estables; uno de sus hijos está avanzado en el estudio porque lleva cuarto año en la universidad para ellos es un sueño que su hijo termine la carrera.
texts.en:
Carlota is asking for a new loan because she needs financing in order to invest in her pottery business.  This will make it possible for her to buy clay, firewood, nacazcol [a black dye], and pottery and to pay transportation and labor costs, among other expenses.

Her previous loan made it possible for her to buy raw materials for winter and she used that material to produce items almost the entire year so the loan was of great help to them.

The nuclear family persists and economic conditions are stable.  One of her children has advanced in his studies since he’s now in the fourth year at university and for them it’s a dream that he completes his professional training.

loans.use: to buy clay, firewood, dye, pottery and to pay transportation and labor costs.

loans.name: Francisco Jose

texts.es: Don Francisco, es un señor casado, padre de familia con tres hijos a los que mantiene y les da estudios, su esposa le ayuda con lo poco que gana de sus ventas de productos por  catálogos, el continua su labor como taxista recorriendo diferentes puntos de la ciudad arriesgándose la vida, ya que hoy en día los asaltos están a la luz del día. Don Francisco solicita este crédito con el ánimo de mejorar las condiciones de su hogar, desea repellar paredes y poner cerámica, dejando pendientes el poner ventanas, puertas entre otras cosas que no ha podido realizar por falta de mejores ingresos.
texts.en:
Francisco is a married man, father of three children he supports and provides schooling for.  His wife helps him with the little she earns selling products via catalog.  He continues working as a taxi driver heading to various points in the city risking his life because nowadays assaults occur even in broad daylight.

Francisco is requesting this loan hoping to improve his home’s conditions; he wants to plaster the walls and install tile still leaving for later installing windows and doors among other things he’s been unable to do so far because of his limited resources.

loans.use: to buy cement and tile.

loans.name: Francisca

texts.en: Francisca is a 41-year-old woman from the community of Alicia, Bohol.  She is married and has three children ages 7, 13 and 15. Francisca is engaged in rice farming and bamboo matting for 7 years now. This is her main livelihood to support the needs of her family. She also raises hogs for a living. She is asking for a loan to buy more bamboo, rice and feed for her animals. She hopes that she can continue sending her children to school and make a success out of her business.

loans.use: to buy more bamboo, rice and feed for her businesses

loans.name: Gay

texts.en:
Gay is 31 years old and from Carlos P. Garcia, Bohol. She has been involved in rice farming and a sari-sari store business for 3 years now. In her store, she sells canned goods, chips, noodles, seasonings and toiletries.

Gay is asking for a loan to buy merchandise like noodles, canned sardines, cooking oil, and toiletries. She is determined to manage her business well so she can have a better return of her investment. In the future, she hopes to expand her store and offer more services and merchandise.

loans.use: to buy noodles, canned sardines, cooking oil and toiletries

loans.name: Gemma

texts.en: Gemma is from Ubay, Bohol. She is a 37-year-old  widow with four children ages 5-14. She has been involved in a fishing business for 5 years now to support her family. She is asking for a loan of 8,000 PHP to buy a new fish net, floaters and crab traps. Gemma hopes to continue to expand her business so she can support her family. In the future, she hopes to see her children become successful with their studies.

loans.use: to buy a fish net, floaters, and crab traps

loans.name: Marichie

texts.en:
Marichie is a 32-year-old woman from Carlos P. Garcia, Bohol. She has five children ages 1-9. Marichie supports them with the income from being a food vendor and having a 'sari-sari' store business. Her business started two years ago.  

Marichie usually cooks home-made dishes like sautéed vegetables and beans and also sells chips, toiletries and canned goods in her store. She is asking for a loan of 8000 PHP to buy chips, noodles and mongo beans.  Her ultimate goal is to send her children to school so they can have a better future.

loans.use: to buy chips, noodles and mongo beans

loans.name: Irazema

texts.es:
Irazema es una mujer de 26 años, es soltera, vive en la ciudad de Pucallpa con sus padres, a quienes agradece todo su apoyo, Irazema es una persona muy amable, trabajadora y entusiasta, que tiene un gran deseo de superación; gracias a su esfuerzo y al apoyo de sus padres, Irazema pudo estudiar la carrera profesional de Educación Inicial, en sus ratos libres le gusta  pasear por las caluras y acogedoras calles de su ciudad, y en algunas ocasiones cocina un riquísimo Ceviche para compartir con su familia.
Por iniciativa propia, con mucho empeño y dedicación, Irazema trabaja como profesora de educación inicial en un pequeño centro educativo de su ciudad, ella trabaja todos los días por un aproximado de 8 horas y cree que le va bien por su responsabilidad y por el trato amable que brinda a los demás.
Irazema se encuentra muy agradecida con los prestamistas Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá realizar la compra de una laptop, la cual le servirá de mucho para poder desarrollar sus trabajos académicos y labores propias de su trabajo, así pues ella seguirá trabajando y esforzándose para lograr su gran sueño de tener su propia casa y junto con su familia desea salir adelante.
texts.en:
Irazema is 26 years old, single, and lives with her parents in the city of Pucallpa.  She really appreciates all of their support.  Irazema is a very friendly, hardworking person with a great desire to succeed. Thanks to her effort and parents’ support, Irazema was able to study for a career in primary education.  She likes to walk along the cozy streets in her spare time and sometimes prepares a delicious ceviche to share with her family.

On her own initiative and with great effort and dedication, Irazema  works as a primary school teacher at a small education center in town.  She works for about eight hours daily and believes that things are going well for her because of the polite treatment she gives to others.

Irazema is very grateful to the Kiva lenders and thanks to their help she will be able to buy a laptop which will be very helpful to her in developing her academic work.  She will be able to continue working and achieve her greatest dream of having a home of her own and get ahead with her family.

loans.use: to buy a laptop.

loans.name: Susana Del Carmen

texts.es: Susana de 34 años de edad, vive con esposo y sus tres hijos en casa propia, La señora Susana es una mujer trabajadora, responsable y muy emprendedora.desdea hace varios años se dedica a la  producción y venta de productos lácteos en la zona donde reside. Tiene muy buena clientela ya que ha sabido ganarse la confianza de sus clientes. Ofrece calidad y buenos precios en sus productos, ha decidido invertir en el cuidado de sus ganados ya que de eso depende su negocio. Por eso ha solicitado un crédito para poder comprar vitaminas para el ganado y ajustar para la compra de una vaca lechera que le permita crecer en el negocio. Con esto espera obtener resultados favorables y continuar brindando la ayuda económica a su hogar que tanto lo necesita.
texts.en:
Susana, 34, lives with her husband and three children in her own house.  She’s a hardworking, responsible, very enterprising woman who has worked for several years producing and selling dairy products in the zone where she resides.  She has a very good clientele since she’s succeeded in winning over their confidence.  She offers good quality and prices.

She’s decided to invest in her cattle’s care since her business depends on them and this is why she’s requested a loan to buy vitamins for her cattle and to make up the difference to afford another dairy cow that will make it possible for her to increase her business.  She hopes thus to obtain favorable results and continue providing the economic help her home so needs.

loans.use: to buy vitamins and a dairy cow.

loans.name: Milagro Del Carmen

texts.es:
Milagro, solicita un nuevo préstamo por la necesidad de invertir más en la tienda, así adquirir variedad de mercadería; este le permitirá comprar productos perecederos y no perecederos,  arroz, frijoles, cereales entre otros, asimismo le ayudara a reparar la refrigeradora.
El crédito anterior le ayudo a invertir mucho más en la tienda y ofrecerle productos de calidad a su clientela. Las circunstancias familiares han cambiado y las condiciones económicas.
texts.en:
Milagro is requesting a new loan because she needs to invest more in the store.  She will buy a variety of merchandise both perishable and not like rice, beans and cereals, among others.  It will also help her repair the refrigerator.

Her previous loan helped her very much to invest much more in the store to provide quality products for her customers.  Her family situation has changed and so have her economic conditions.

loans.use: to buy stock merchandise and to repair the refrigerator.

loans.name: Darwin Adalberto

texts.es: Darwin de treinta y tres años de edad vive junto a su compañera de vida; él se dedica al cultivo de maíz y sorgo, tiene muchos años de trabajar en la agricultura y se ha hecho de mucha experiencia que le ayuda a obtener las mejores cosechas, comercia en todos los lugares cerca de donde reside y tiene mucha clientela pues las personas saben que todo lo que comercia es de calidad y a excelentes precios, Darwin es un hombre  dedicado a su trabajo y muy responsable, quiere aumentar la producción pero necesita de capital por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar semilla de maíz, sorgo, fertilizante, abono, herramienta, etc. y asi el podra tener mejores ganancias y darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Darwin, 33, lives with his life companion.  He works growing corn and sorghum.  He’s been working in agriculture for many years and has gained much experience that helps him obtain the best crop yields that he sells in all the places near where he lives; he has a large clientele because people know that what he sells is good quality at excellent prices.

Darwin’s a man who is devoted to his work and is very responsible; he wants to increase production but needs capital to do so which is why he’s asking Integral for a loan to buy corn and sorghum seeds, fertilizer, manure, tools, etc. to earn higher profits and give his family better quality of life.

loans.use: to seeds and farm supplies.
